NewGovernor(address).details: Emitted when a new Governor contract is deployed using this factory.

params._address: The address of the newly deployed Governor contract.

params._executionTimeout: Time in seconds after approval that allows to execute transactions of the approved list.
params._submissionBaseDeposit: The base deposit required for submission.
params._submissionTimeout: Time in seconds allocated for submitting transaction list.
params._wNative: The wrapped native token address, typically wETH.
params._withdrawTimeout: Time in seconds after submission that allows to withdraw submitted list.

devdoc.title: GovernorFactory This contract acts as a registry for KlerosGovernor instances.
